mapper.select: /*SystemBatchRgstMapper.getBatchRgstList*/ SELECT luf.FILE_UPLD_DT as fileUpldDt ,luf.OFFER_TYPE as offerType ,luf.FILE_NM as fileNm ,luf.FILE_UPLD_SUCES_CNT as fileUpldSucesCnt ,luf.FILE_UPLD_FAIL_CNT as fileUpldFailCnt ,e.NAME as custNm ,luf.POINT_TRT_STATUS as pointTrtStautsCd ,lc.CHNL_NO as chnlNo ,lc.CHNL_NM as chnlNm ,luf.ACU_RDN as acuRdnCd ,e1.NAME as ridActcSbst ,luf.ACTC_TRT_DT as actcTrtDt ,e2.NAME as ridApv ,luf.APV_TRT_DT as apvTrtDt ,luf.POINT_SUCES_CNT as pointSucesCnt ,luf.POINT_FAIL_CNT as pointFailCnt ,e3.NAME as ridPointEmp ,luf.RID as rid ,luf.FILE_PATH as filePath ,${strColumn} FROM loy.loy_upld_file luf WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e WITH (NOLOCK) on e.id = luf.RID_UPLD_EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc WITH (NOLOCK) on lc.rid = luf.RID_CHNL LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e1 WITH (NOLOCK) on e1.id = luf.RID_ACTC_SBST LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e2 WITH (NOLOCK) on e2.id = luf.RID_APV LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e3 WITH (NOLOCK) on e3.id = luf.RID_POINT_EMP WHERE ${strCondWhere} ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/*SystemBatchRgstMapper.getBatchRgstDetail*/ SELECT luf.FILE_NM as fileNm ,luf.FILE_PATH as filePath ,luf.ACU_RDN as acuRdn ,luf.POINT_TRT_STATUS as pointTrtStauts ,lc.CHNL_NO as chnlNo ,lc.CHNL_NM as chnlNm ,lc.BIZR_NO as bizrNo ,e1.NAME as actcNm ,luf.ACTC_TRT_DT as actcTrtDt ,e2.NAME as apvNm ,luf.APV_TRT_DT as apvTrtDt ,luf.ACTC_SBST as actcSbst ,luf.APV_SBST as apvSbst ,luf.FILE_UPLD_DT as fileUpldDt ,e.NAME as upldEmpNm ,luf.FILE_UPLD_SUCES_CNT as fileUpldSucesCnt ,luf.FILE_UPLD_FAIL_CNT as fileUpldFailCnt ,luf.POINT_TRT_DT as pointTrtDt ,e3.NAME as pointEmpNm ,luf.POINT_SUCES_CNT as pointSucesCnt ,luf.POINT_FAIL_CNT as pointFailCnt ,luf.RID_ACTC_SBST as ridActcSbst ,luf.RID_APV as ridApv ,luf.RID_CHNL as ridChnl ,luf.RMARK as rmark ,luf.RID_UPLD_EMP as ridUpldEmp ,luf.OFFER_TYPE as offerType FROM loy.loy_upld_file luf WITH (NOLOCK) left outer join LOY.LOY_CHNL lc WITH (NOLOCK) on lc.RID = luf.RID_CHNL LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e1 WITH (NOLOCK) on e1.id = luf.RID_ACTC_SBST LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e2 WITH (NOLOCK) on e2.id = luf.RID_APV LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e3 WITH (NOLOCK) on e3.id = luf.RID_POINT_EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN com.employee e WITH (NOLOCK) on e.id = luf.RID_UPLD_EMP WHERE luf.rid = #{rid}
/*SystemBatchRgstMapper.callLookUpValue*/ SELECT CODE_NAME AS codeName FROM COM.COMM_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'POINT_TRANS_FLG' AND MARK_NAME = '10'

/*SystemBatchRgstMapper.getParentAcuRdn*/ SELECT CODE_NAME AS codeName FROM COM.COMM_CODe WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = (SELECT PAR_CODE_ID FROM COM.COMM_CODE cc WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE code_name =#{acuRdn} AND GROUP_CODE = 'TXN_REASON_ALL_TYPE' )
mapper.update: /*SystemBatchRgstMapper.updateBatchCancel*/ UPDATE loy.loy_upld_file luf INNER JOIN COM.COM_ELEC_APRV mea ON luf.RID = mea.CAM_ID SET luf.POINT_TRT_STATUS = '45' , luf.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , mea.ELEC_APRV_STATUS_CD = '002' WHERE luf.RID = #{rid}
mapper.insert:
/*SystemBatchRgstMapper./insertPntUploadItem*/
INTO LOY.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD_ITEM ( RID , CREATE_BY , MODIFY_BY , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , FLAG , RID_PNT_UPLOAD , MBR_NO , TARGET_NM , TARGET_HHP_NO , ACRL_AMT , BATCH_RESULT_CD , BATCH_ERROR_DESC , RID_MBR , RID_CAM ) VALUES ( COM.GETNEWID('') , #{item.createBy} , #{item.modifyBy} , GETDATE() , GETDATE() , 1 , #{item.ridPntUpload} , #{item.mbrNo} , #{item.targetNm} , #{item.targetHhpNo} , TO_NUMBER(#{item.acrlAmt}) , NULL , NULL , CASE WHEN #{item.mbrNo} IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT RID FROM LOY.LOY_MBR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MBR_NO = #{item.mbrNo}) ELSE (SELECT lm.RID FROM LOY.LOY_MBR lm WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST lc ON lm.RID_CUST = lc.RID WHERE lm.HHP_NO = #{item.targetHhpNo} AND lc.CUST_NM = #{item.targetNm}) END , (SELECT ID FROM MKT.MKT_CAM_MST WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE DISP_NO = #{item.dispNo} AND FLAG = 1) )
mapper.select: /* LOYBatchRgst.selectAcrlPntMbrList */ SELECT lpui.rid AS itemRid , lpui.RID_MBR AS ridMbr , lpui.ACRL_AMT AS acrlAmt , lpui.RID_CAM AS promRid , lo.OFR_NM AS ofrNm , lo.OFR_NO AS ofrNo , lo.RID AS ofrRid , lpu.RID_PGM AS pgmRid , lp.PGM_NO AS pgmNo , lpu.PROC_TYPE_CD AS procTypeCd , lpu.PROC_DETAIL_TYPE_CD AS procDtlTypeCd , ISNULL(lpui.TXN_AMT, 0) AS txnAmt FROM LOY.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD_ITEM lpui WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD lpu WITH (NOLOCK) ON lpui.RID_PNT_UPLOAD = lpu.RID AND lpu.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_PGM lp WITH (NOLOCK) ON lpu.RID_PGM = lp.RID AND lp.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_OFR lo WITH (NOLOCK) ON lpu.RID_OFFER = lo.RID AND lo.FLAG = 1 WHERE lpui.RID_PNT_UPLOAD = #{rid} AND lpui.BATCH_RESULT_CD = 'W' AND lpui.FLAG = 1

/* SystemBatchRgstMapper.setBatchLog */ SELECT REQ_CREATE_DATE AS createDt , TR_NO AS trNo , REQ_MSG_TYPE AS logType , REQ_API_NO AS typeNo , CONVERT(VARCHAR, REQ_CREATE_DATE,120 ) AS reqTrDt , S1.CHNL_NO AS storeCd , CHNL_NM AS storeNm , DVC_NO AS posCd , RES_MSG_TYPE AS blogType , RES_API_NO AS btypeNo , CONVERT(VARCHAR, RES_CREATE_DATE, 120) AS resSendDt , RST AS rst , S1.REQ_API_NO as telNmCdNm , S1.RST_CD as rstCdNm , RST_MSG AS rstMsg , lam.API_NM AS apiNm
, datediff( S , S1.REQ_CREATE_DATE, S1.RES_CREATE_DATE) AS actTime , S1.SEQ_NO AS seqNo , S1.totalCount AS totalCount FROM ( SELECT T1.CREATE_DATE AS REQ_CREATE_DATE ,T1.TR_NO AS TR_NO ,T1.MSG_TYPE AS REQ_MSG_TYPE ,T1.API_NO AS REQ_API_NO ,T1.CHNL_NO AS CHNL_NO ,T1.DVC_NO AS DVC_NO ,T2.MSG_TYPE AS RES_MSG_TYPE ,T2.API_NO AS RES_API_NO ,T2.CREATE_DATE AS RES_CREATE_DATE ,T2.RST AS RST ,T2.RST_CD AS RST_CD ,T2.RST_MSG AS RST_MSG ,T1.SEQ_NO ,T1.totalCount AS totalCount FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A I_APPRO_MSG_LOG_IX05) */ A.CREATE_DATE ,A.TR_NO ,A.MSG_TYPE ,A.API_NO ,A.TR_TIME ,A.CHNL_NO ,A.DVC_NO ,A.SEQ_NO ,C.totalCount FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) , ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(A I_APPRO_MSG_LOG_IX05) */ count(*) AS totalCount FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ${strWhere} AND ${strCondWhere} AND A.MSG_TYPE ='REQ') C WHERE ${strWhere} AND ${strCondWhere} AND A.MSG_TYPE = 'REQ' ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC ${strEndPaging} ) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.TR_NO ,A.MSG_TYPE ,A.API_NO ,A.CREATE_DATE ,A.RST ,A.RST_CD ,A.RST_MSG ,A.SEQ_NO FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ${strWhere} --AND ${strCondWhere} AND A.MSG_TYPE = 'RES' ) T2 ON T1.TR_NO = t2.TR_NO ) S1 LEFT JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL S2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON S1.CHNL_NO = S2.CHNL_NO LEFT JOIN LOY.LOY_API_MGT lam WITH (NOLOCK) ON S1.RES_API_NO = lam.API_NO ORDER BY ${strOrderby}

/* SystemBatchRgstMapper.setApprFailList */ SELECT S1.REQ_DT AS createDt -- 생성일시 ,S1.TR_NO AS trNo -- 거래번호 , S1.REQ_TYPE AS typeNo -- 요청유형 , (SELECT TOP 1 MARK_NAME FROM COM.COMM_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CODE_NAME = S1.REQ_TYPE AND FLAG = 1 AND GROUP_CODE = 'APPR_SERVER_TR_TYPE' ) AS telNm , CONVERT(VARCHAR, S1.REQ_DT, 120) AS reqTrDt --요청일자 , S1.CHNL_NO AS storeCd --storeCd , (SELECT TOP 1 CHNL_NM FROM LOY.LOY_CHNL A WHERE A.CHNL_NO = S1.CHNL_NO ) AS storeNm --매장명 , S1.DVC_NO AS posCd --포스코드 , S1.RES_TYPE AS blogType --로그유형 , CONVERT(VARCHAR, S1.RES_DT, 120) AS resSendDt -- 응답일자 , S1.RES_TYPE AS btypeNo --응답 유형
, datediff( S , S1.REQ_DT, S1.RES_DT) AS actTime , S1.RST AS rst --결과 , S1.RST_CD AS rstCd -- 결과코드 , S1.SEQ_NO AS seqNo , (SELECT TOP 1 MARK_NAME FROM COM.COMM_CODE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE CODE_NAME = S1.RST_CD AND FLAG = 1 AND GROUP_CODE = 'APPR_SERVER_RPLY_CD' ) AS resNm , S1.RST_MSG AS rstMsg --결과메시지 , C1.* FROM ( SELECT T1.TR_NO , T1.RST , T1.RST_CD , T1.RST_MSG , T1.CREATE_DATE AS RES_DT , T1.API_NO AS RES_TYPE , T2.CHNL_NO , T2.DVC_NO , T2.CREATE_DATE AS REQ_DT , T2.API_NO AS REQ_TYPE , T1.SEQ_NO FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A I_APPRO_MSG_LOG_IX05) */ A.TR_NO , A.RST , A.RST_CD, A.RST_MSG , A.CREATE_DATE , A.API_NO , A.SEQ_NO FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND A.RST ='F' AND A.MSG_TYPE ='RES' ) T1 JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A I_APPRO_MSG_LOG_IX05) */ A.TR_NO , A.CHNL_NO , A.DVC_NO , A.CREATE_DATE , A.API_NO , A.SEQ_NO FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ${strCondWhere} AND A.MSG_TYPE ='REQ' ) T2 ON T1.TR_NO = T2.TR_NO ) S1, ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(A I_APPRO_MSG_LOG_IX05) */ count(*) AS totalCount FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ${strCondWhere} AND A.MSG_TYPE ='RES' AND A.RST ='F' ) C1 ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* SystemBatchRgstMapper.setReqResData */ SELECT A.MSG AS reqMsg -- 요청 전문 , B.MSG AS resMsg -- 응답 전문 FROM LOGS.API_MSG_LOG A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN LOGS.API_MSG_LOG B WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.TR_NO = B.TR_NO AND B.MSG_TYPE='RES' WHERE a.TR_NO =#{trNo} AND A.MSG_TYPE ='REQ'
mapper.update:
/*SystemBatchRgstMapper./updatePntUploadInvalidItemRslt*/ UPDATE LOY.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD_ITEM SET BATCH_RESULT_CD = #{batchResultCd} , BATCH_ERROR_DESC = #{batchErrorDesc} , MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE RID_PNT_UPLOAD = #{rid} AND FLAG = 1 AND BATCH_RESULT_CD != #{batchResultCd}
AND RID_MBR IS NULL
AND (ACRL_AMT IS NULL OR ACRL_AMT <= 0)
AND RID_CAM IS NULL
AND MBR_NO IS NULL
AND (ACRL_AMT IS NULL OR ACRL_AMT <= 0)
AND RID_CAM IS NULL
AND RID_MBR IS NULL
AND (ACRL_AMT IS NULL OR ACRL_AMT <= 0)
AND RID_CAM IS NULL
AND MBR_NO IS NULL
AND TARGET_HHP_NO IS NULL
AND (ACRL_AMT IS NULL OR ACRL_AMT <= 0)
AND RID_CAM IS NULL
mapper.select: /* SystemBatchRgstMapper.getUnSubExcelUploadList */ SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), t1.FILE_UPLD_DT, 120) AS fileUpldDt , t1.FILE_NM AS fileNm , t1.FILE_UPLD_TOT_CNT AS fileTotCnt , t1.FILE_UPLD_SUCES_CNT AS fileUpldSucesCnt , t1.FILE_UPLD_FAIL_CNT AS fileUpldFailCnt , t1.POINT_TRT_STATUS AS pointTrtStatus , t3.NAME AS ridUpldEmp , t1.RID AS rid , CEILING(COUNT(distinct t1.rid) OVER()) totalCount FROM loy.LOY_UPLD_FILE t1 WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN com.CRM_USER t2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON t2.RID = t1.RID_UPLD_EMP AND t2.FLAG = 1 JOIN com.EMPLOYEE t3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON t3.ID = t2.ID_EMPLOYEE AND t3.FLAG = 1 WHERE ${strWhere} AND ${strCondWhere} AND t1.flag = 1 ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}
mapper.update: /* SystemBatchRgstMapper.updateOverLapPromotionUser */ UPDATE loy.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD_ITEM SET BATCH_RESULT_CD = 'F' , BATCH_ERROR_DESC = N'금일 프로모션 중복' WHERE FLAG = 1 AND TARGET_NM = secu.fn_getEncrypt(#{cipherKey},#{custNm}) AND TARGET_HHP_NO = secu.fn_getEncrypt(#{cipherKey},#{hhpNo}) AND RID = #{rid}
mapper.select:
/* SystemBatchRgstMapper.selectTxnCodeList */ SELECT c1.CODE_NAME AS codeName , c1.MARK_NAME AS markNAme FROM COM.COMM_CODE c1 with (nolock) WHERE c1.FLAG = 1 AND c1.GROUP_CODE = 'PNT_TXN_DTL_TYPE' AND c1.PAR_CODE_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM COM.COMM_CODE with (nolock) WHERE GROUP_CODE='PNT_TXN_TYPE' AND CODE_NAME=#{pntTxnCode})
AND c1.CODE_NAME NOT IN ('130','131')
AND c1.CODE_NAME NOT IN ('210','220','250','270','211')
ORDER BY c1.SEQ ASC

/* SystemBatchRgstMapper.selectClearMaskPntItemMbr */ SELECT lpui.TARGET_NM AS unMaskCustNm , lpui.TARGET_HHP_NO AS unMaskHhp , lpui.WEB_ID AS unMaskWebId FROM LOY.LOY_PNT_UPLOAD_ITEM lpui with (nolock) WHERE lpui.FLAG = 1 AND lpui.RID = #{rid}
